2、Scan QR code to add the camera, optimize the installation
3、Video shows the resolution
4、Optimize connection speed
5、Cloud storage supports audio playback
6、Fix other bugs

1.Add in-app purchase function.
2. Supports the funciton of clicking the message to view the corresponding video.
3. Support free cloud storage services for DB1 visual doorbell’s visitors, push and message records.

1.Being compatible with new product——Solar power supply ip camera S1
2.Support new ip camera.C46 and C46S.Newly add"privacy location"function.
3.Newly increased alert for expire Cloud storage.
4.Optimizing UE for "DB1 visible doorbell",adding prompt notification for anti-dismantle ,low power supply and electric quantit etc.
5. HD definition will be played acquiescently when 1.0 MP and some other items play the real time video
6.Renovating some existed known BUGs.
Fix known bugs

Update this time:
- Monitoring smart upgrade: support human-shape detection, human-shape tracking function, monitoring and alarm become more accurate and efficient;
- Support new products: CS22S, CS24S, C52S, enrich the Pet function of C38S-P;
- Preset position setting and cruise operation are simpler, pressing the video screen for 3 seconds to complete in one-step;
- Add supported Bulgarian language.

Recently updated:
- Support for new products: WM2、D2C
- And has fixed bugs which are known
Fixed some bugs on iOS13

Update as below this time :
- New version enriches the function experience of C46 and supports C19S/C39S
- And has fixed bugs which are known

Recently updated:
- New upgrade of security regime, dual authentication on line, the addition of 2 times for the device requires to scan QR code (new firmware is required).
- You can use the QR code to share your device ，or scan the code to add it quickly (new firmware is required).
- Cloud storage video supports one-click downloads.
- Cloud storage viewing supports the vertical version.
- Messages can be downloaded and deleted (new firmware required).

- New upgrade of security regime, dual authentication on line, the addition of 2 times for the device requires to scan QR code (new firmware is required).
- You can use the QR code to share your device ，or scan the code to add it quickly (new firmware is required).
- Cloud storage video supports one-click downloads.
- Cloud storage viewing supports the vertical version.
- Messages can be downloaded and deleted (new firmware required).

Recently updated:
- Added five languages: Turkish, Arabic, Romanian, Indonesian, Greek.
- Fixed some bugs from user feedback.

1. Newly added WeChat and Facebook account login.
2. Newly added account cancellation function and privacy agreement.

AI + is now online! Smart housekeeping / protection, AI first.
- Human detection: new AI algorithm, more accurate alarm capture;
- Sound management: The sound broadcasted by the camera supports independent entry and personalized settings, making the care and alarm more intelligent, accurate and playable;
- E-fence: The detection area is more accurate, and the privacy area is clearly divided.
- Departure detection: improve employee office efficiency,say No to inefficiency.
The more powerful AI function will also meet with you soon, so stay tuned and expect !

- Human detection: new AI algorithm, more accurate alarm capture;
- Sound management: The sound broadcasted by the camera supports independent entry and personalized settings, making the care and alarm more intelligent, accurate and playable;
- E-fence: The detection area is more accurate, and the privacy area is clearly divided.
- Departure detection: improve employee office efficiency,say No to inefficiency.

Smart care, AI first
- Face recognition: give you an "identity", so that it is more polite, accurate recognize of you and me;
- Face retrieval: call face, only search the cloud video you want to see, more intelligent and accurate view of cloud storage.
We offer you AI face recognition, stranger recognition and cloud-based face search functions, so that AI can improve your home care and quality of life. I hope you like it. We have been working hard.
